content:
Yes, there are several street markets and shopping centers in Pasay City that are worth visiting. Some of the popular ones include:

1. Baclaran Market - Known for its bargain deals, Baclaran Market is a great place to shop for clothes, accessories, electronics, and more.

2. Mall of Asia - One of the largest shopping centers in the Philippines, Mall of Asia has a wide variety of stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

3. Libertad Market - A local market that offers a selection of fresh produce, meats, and seafood.

4. Newport Mall - Located in Resorts World Manila, this shopping center features high-end stores, restaurants, and a cinema.

5. Baclaran Night Market - Open during weekends, the Baclaran Night Market is a popular spot for street food, clothes, and accessories.

These are just a few of the many shopping destinations in Pasay City that offer a unique shopping experience.
